comment.body: The implementation of Tor means, if i understand it correctly, that i can finally publish and distribute my own sites, even if i am unable to open any ports (DSlite?

Here is a user, who yells, that he would disencourage everyone to use ZeroNet or donate for this project ...
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1C2JhCunGLtvyX56nQ88tcb87WnXspjWN/?Topic:1_1ED3Ho3kmzaKiECtyuqSjDpoE47rKuXeP/Example+of+a+dashboard+for+the+ZeroBlog

I don't know, if you even knew, there was any request for a feature like this.
